name: Zombie Rogue
summary:
Zombie Rogue is a turn-based survival and strategy game. This zombie apocalypse roguelike to roguelite game is built for fast play and massive amounts of replay value. Procedurally generated random levels and items mean that every time you play the game, it's a whole new experience. WARNING: In this game, you will die a lot, but it’s OK. You WILL get stronger and wiser. Trust me you can... 
 
always do it better next time. Survival is all about strategy. Scientists, workers, guards – all sorts of civilian personnel worked in the secret lab until recently. A week ago, a mayday signal is received from the lab. You wake up from unconsciousness, lost your memory. “Who am I?” “Where am I from?” “It's time to descend into the very bottom of darkness and find out my memory.” A deadly plague virus pandemic has turned the world into a residence of evil. Fight for survival in this dead zone full of unkilled zombies. You can trust only yourself. Be careful, many of those who were unturned by the deadly plague virus will pull a dead trigger on your back. The good news is, you are still alive. The bad news is, YOU ARE INFECTED! == Instructions for survivors == • Avoid fighting a horde • Use each Antiserum wisely • Either you turn the others into zombie/human, or you die! • Accept the fact that you are infected • Throwing a melee weapon can deal a lot of damage • Choose the right camp, human or zombie, your choice! • Assemble allies to build your own team • Take advantage of your infection state • Help people/zombies to accomplish their mission Please give us feedback to help us improve this game.
